article_title: Tunisia Needs US Help As It Moves Into Crosshairs of ISIS
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: Tunisia's reward for moving toward Western-style democracy has been to move into the crosshairs of ISIS. The US should help the Tunisians resist terrorism.
